Similarity_how.template: How similar are "{sentence1}" and "{sentence2}"? Give a score between {"0.0"} and {"5.0"}.

Similarity_express_binary.template: Do you think "{sentence1}" and "{sentence2}" express the same thing?

Similarity_seem_binary.template: Do "{sentence1}" and "{sentence2}" seem similar to you ?

Similarity_scale.template: On a scale from {"0.0"} to {"5.0"}, how similar are "{sentence1}" and "{sentence2}"?

Similarity_rate.template:
Rate the similarity of these two sentences: ({"0.0"} being the lowest and {"5.0"} the highest)
"{sentence1}" and "{sentence2}"
